name: OrganismsTestsForNucleicAcid
title: Organisms (Tests for Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the Nucleic Acid of non-specific organisms.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC search: "(microorganism or pathogens) nucleic acid -panel" plus "41852-5 Microorganism or agent identified in Unspecified specimen"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel test)
